Uses of DataTypeHandler in org.tantalum.net
 

Constructors in org.tantalum.net with parameters of type DataTypeHandler
StaticWebCache(char priority, DataTypeHandler handler)
          Create a persistent flash memory cache which acts like a Hashtable Items not already in the cache will be requested from the web with HTTP GET when you request them by url.
StaticWebCache(char priority, DataTypeHandler handler, StaticWebCache.HttpTaskFactory httpTaskFactory)
          Create a persistent flash memory cache, and provide your own class for creating the HttpGetter or HttpPoster that will be used to get cache-miss items from the web.
 

Uses of DataTypeHandler in org.tantalum.storage
 

Classes in org.tantalum.storage that implement DataTypeHandler
 class ImageTypeHandler
          This DataTypeHandler for use with a StaticCache converts from compressed byte[] format (JPG, PNG, etc) to the platform-specific Image class.
 

Methods in org.tantalum.storage that return DataTypeHandler
 DataTypeHandler StaticCache.getHandler()
          Provide the handler which this caches uses for converting between in-memory and binary formats
 

Constructors in org.tantalum.storage with parameters of type DataTypeHandler
StaticCache(char priority, DataTypeHandler handler)
          Create a named cache Caches with higher priority are more likely to keep their data when space is limited.
